data.name: SMA {shortLength} {mediumLength} {longLength} {veryLongLength}
data.script:
line(sma($price.close, options.shortLength), color=options.shortColor)
line(sma($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
line(sma($price.close, options.longLength), color=options.longColor)
line(sma($price.close, options.veryLongLength), color=options.veryLongColor)
